sections.content: Bucks Run ski trail was groomed today, March 9, 2025. Grass has started to show and the north loop of the trail is completely unusable at this time.  The current trail is approximately .5 km.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.
Please adhere to posted hours. Buck’s Run last day is Sunday, March 9, 2025.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Saturday. Expect firm conditions on the trails today.
nubsNob.comments: Spring skiing has arrived at Nub's. The snow is machine groomed course granular snow this morning. As the temperature goes above freezing in the afternoon we anticipate softer snow conditions. Please be aware that icy spots could be encountered if you venture off the groomed areas. Snow coverage and depth is still very good on the vast majority of terrain. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
